title: Modern Duplex Haven in Lively Wola with Superb Connectivity
description: Experience the vibrant city life in this stylish 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom duplex, spanning a spacious 165 sqm. Impeccably finished, the property features expansive living areas with an open-plan design, natural light, and reversed-cycle underfloor heating for year-round comfort. The main suite comes complete with an ensuite bathroom, while guest rooms are perfectly sized for creative workspaces or guest stays. Private elevator access directly to the apartment and heated driveway add luxe, city-friendly touches.
neighborhood_description: Located in Wola—one of Warsaw’s fastest-growing, highly urban neighborhoods—this home sits amidst bike-friendly streets, community pockets, and hip urban cafés. Enjoy unrivaled connectivity with proximity to public transport hubs, international business centers, and direct highway access, ideal for exploring both downtown Warsaw and beyond. Spending time outdoors is easy with green spaces just a jog or bike ride away.
lifestyle_benefits: set in a buzzing expat hotspot
element of community living in central Warsaw
quiet residential surroundings despite city buzz
target_buyer: Ideal for young international professionals or families seeking sleek city living in a community-driven neighborhood, looking to blend home comfort with immediate access to Warsaw’s business and leisure scene.
market_positioning: Positioned as a premium yet practical choice for expats and professionals in the Warsaw market, offering a rare mix of large-format modern living within close reach of the city’s cultural and corporate amenities.
